borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2011/01753/FUL granted 29th March 2012 for the 'Demolition of existing buildings and the erection on Carnwath Road of 1 x part 4, part 5, part 6 storey building and 1 x part 1, part 5, part 6 storey building, plus basement car park and residents gym to provide 135 apartments and one single, family dwelling; and the erection on Sulivan Road of 13 x terraced, mews style houses of 3 storeys plus mansard roof; with associated car parking (140 spaces), cycle parking (172 spaces, plus 8 visitor spaces), motor cycle parking (6 spaces), landscaping and amenity space including children's play area'. Amendments to include: Management room changed to residents' facilities, stair and lift cores redesigned, wheelchair adaptable dwellings enlarged, additional doors added to roof terrace, revision of windows to improve internal layouts and access to terraces of penthouses, reduction in size of basement and enlargement of cycle stores, additional of new sprinkler tanks and dedicated power supply plant rooms, dedicated basement stair providing escape route and dedicated smoke extract system added, and additional smoke vents added to top floor lobbies.
